sense.gloss: something heard for the first time, hearing something for the first time

sdata.j: それは↑初耳↑↓|はつみみ|↓ですね。
それは↑初耳↑↓|はつみみ|↓だ。
これは↑初耳↑↓|はつみみ|↓だ。
このニュースは↑初耳↑↓|はつみみ|↓です。
sdata.e: This news is new to me.
This is the first time I heard about it.
This is the first time I've heard about it.
It's the first time I've heard that.

sdata.j: その↑言葉↑↓ことば↓は↑初耳↑↓|はつみみ|↓です。
sdata.e: It's the first time I hear this word.

sdata.j: その↑言葉↑↓ことば↓は↑初耳↑↓|はつみみ|↓です。
sdata.e: This is the first time I've heard that word.
